settings.title: About the shop
settings.content: An online embroidery and gift shop located in Lexington, KY.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

settings.title: Featured Collections for your Little Ones
Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.title: Welcome to Saddle Stitches
settings.content: Sign up for our newsletter to receive 15% off your first order

settings.title: Do you ship outside the US?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: For items that do not require personalization, your order will ship in 24-48 hours. For personalized items normal turn around time is 7 Business Days + shipping time to your destination. Each personalized order is custom made per your special instructions. Should we encounter a delay you will be contacted about your order. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use USPS and UPS. You will be asked to choose the best shipping method for you order during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We do not offer returns or exchanges on personalized items. Non-personalized items purchased on sale are final sale. Please contact us if you need help with your order.

settings.title: Do you offer Gift Wrap?
settings.answer: Yes we do! Our gift wrap includes a box, ribbon and enclosure card. Please check the Add Gift Wrap box during check out and we will take care of the rest.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: Once orders have been placed that require embroidery or personalization they cannot be cancelled, returned or exchanged.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
